attributes.action: Not use tax payers money to fund the olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I object most strongly at having to fund the olympics - big kids sports day, a completely pointless waste of tax payers money. This is not what we pay our tax for, you should ask for voluntary contributions from individuals and business, then if we want it we will pay for it. Most people do not want it, this govenment is completely out of touch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
